pageContent.title: Pump the Brakes
pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Pump the Brakes</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">“I don’t know that this is something I want to jump into right away. After thinking about it a little bit more, I’d like to have more experience with Samsca on an inpatient basis before I consider prescribing it for continuing therapy after discharge.”</welcomeText>
